Reviews.Title: A great business PC
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: A great business PC.  Everything working as expected.  Upgraded memory on the Laptop in a snap.  Built with Windows 7 but has a Windows 8 sticker on it?  Webcam works great.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy, nice-looking PC
Reviews.Author: PJ "PJ"
Reviews.Content: This is a silver-colored, "metal" cased PC. It seems a little more sturdy than the usual black plastic cases, I guess that's why it's recommended for travel or heavy business use.

Reviews.Title: HP Laptop
Reviews.Author: Scott Cordry
Reviews.Content: This is a solid business laptop which comes ready for a docking station and Windows 7. I've used one for 4 years

Reviews.Title: Looks nice when new, not durable or reliable in the long run
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W. Behm "Jeff B."
Reviews.Content: I've had this laptop for work, for about a year now. While HP went to great lengths to make this unit look swanky & modern, it isn't reliable or durable. The keys stick. It locks up regularly, and does nothing very well. Perhaps if I did not also have a MacBook Air to compare it to, I might like it more, but I do so I don't. I would not recommend this laptop. It screams "cheap" in it's functions. The first time you open the DVD drive tray, you'll gasp that it didn't just fall off. Yikes.

Reviews.Title: my disappointed
Reviews.Author: Chester
Reviews.Content: I don't know how to complain about this because this is first time to use laptop and window 7, I really disappointed. I try to send email or save or accepted on internet but I can't do that, it never happened to me when I used window XP
